meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Road Traffic (Traffic Control) (Designation of Prohibited and Restricted Zones) Notice
main.enactingFormula: (Regulation 14(1) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations (Cap. 374 sub. leg. G), as modified by section 1 of Part V of Schedule 2 to the Airport Authority Bylaw (Cap. 483 sub. leg. A))

section.name: s1
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: Authority (管理局) means the Airport Authority within the meaning of the Airport Authority Ordinance (Cap. 483);
Bylaw (《附例》) means the Airport Authority Bylaw (Cap. 483 sub. leg. A);
overall length (全長度) has the meaning assigned to it by regulation 2 of the Road Traffic (Construction and Maintenance of Vehicles) Regulations (Cap. 374 sub. leg. A); (L.N. 88 of 2007)
restricted zone permit (限制區許可證) means a permit issued by the Authority with the approval of the Commissioner for the purposes of section 50(1)(b) of the Modified Regulations; (L.N. 122 of 2025)
scheduled service (專綫服務) has the meaning given by regulation 2(1) of the Road Traffic (Public Service Vehicles) Regulations (Cap. 374 sub. leg. D). (L.N. 122 of 2025)

section.name: s2
section.heading: Designation of prohibited zones
section.content: Each area specified in column 1 of Schedule 1 is designated as a prohibited zone in which the driving of the motor vehicles specified in column 2 opposite to that area (except a vehicle in respect of which a prohibited zone permit is in force) is prohibited absolutely.

subsection.leadIn: Each area specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 2 is designated as a restricted zone in which the driver of any motor vehicle specified in column 2 opposite to that area (except the driver of a motor vehicle in respect of which a restricted zone permit is in force) is prohibited absolutely from— (L.N. 88 of 2007)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: picking up or setting down passengers; or

subsection.content: Each area specified in column 1 of Part 2 of Schedule 2 is designated as a restricted zone in which the driver of any motor vehicle specified in column 2 opposite to that area (except the driver of a motor vehicle in respect of which a restricted zone permit is in force) is prohibited absolutely from doing any act specified in column 3 opposite to that motor vehicle. (L.N. 88 of 2007)
